sentence: She added: "He doesn't have the votes that are there, because there's many of us that are very unhappy about the failure to hold Republicans accountable, while conservatives like me, Paul Gosar and many others just constantly take the abuse by the Democrats."
author: Chris Cillizza
title: One sentence that sums up Kevin McCarthy's House speaker problem

sentence: Related: White nationalists flaunt their traction within Republican Party at annual gathering in Florida Marjorie Taylor Greene's speed walk through the Holocaust Museum didn't teach her anything House votes to strip Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of committee assignments Rep. Paul Gosar is censured by U.S. House; removed from committees This is a short blurb about Daily Kos.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Kevin McCarthy's failure to act on Gosar and Greene's white nationalist flirtation says it all

sentence: Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar spoke at the far-far-right America First Political Action Conference, with Greene’s appearance following a “round of applause for Russia” led by conference organizer Nick Fuentes.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Kevin McCarthy Won’t Act Against ‘Appalling’ White Nationalists Greene And Gosar

sentence: However, the House Freedom Caucus — a group of the most far-right members of the House, including Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) — wants to delay passage of the aid, urging "a collective resolve among Republicans" to "not pass a government funding bill that includes aid to Ukraine or for COVID-19 relief efforts."
author: Emily Singer
title: Far-Right House ‘Freedom’ Caucus Seeks To Delay Aid To Ukraine
